tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;steam_api.dll;steamclient.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>rust_server_Data\Managed</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>FilePath</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 <DisableSymlinkCheck>false</DisableSymlinkCheck>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2014-03-26 19:41:11" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>server.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2023-03-30 23:29:32" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_config_files.template: server.maxplayers $[Service.Slots] server.hostname "$[HostName]" rcon.password "$[RConPassword]" server.port $[Service.GamePort] crafting.timescale 0.3 save.autosavetime 3800 server.pvp "true" truth.enforce true sleepers.on false crafting.instant false airdrop.min_players 10 crafting.timescale "1" falldamage.enabled true env.daylength 35 env.nightlength 15 decay.deploy_maxhealth_sec = "432000" decay.decaytickrate = "300" server.sendrate 5 server.framerate 30

tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="6603" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-02-22 22:07:07" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-15 23:25:03" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off rmdir "backup" /s /q mkdir "backup\serverdata" copy /Y "serverdata\rust_clans.txt" ".\backup\serverdata" copy /Y "serverdata\rust_island_2013.sav" ".\backup\serverdata" copy /Y "serverdata\rust_banned.txt" ".\backup\serverdata" copy /Y "serverdata\blocked_ip.txt" ".\backup\serverdata" copy /Y "serverdata\rust_users.txt" ".\backup\serverdata" copy /Y "serverdata\rust_zones.txt" ".\backup\serverdata" xcopy /Y /E "serverdata\cfg\RustExtended" ".\backup\serverdata\cfg\RustExtended\" copy /Y "serverdata\cfg\server.cfg" ".\backup\serverdata\cfg" copy /Y "serverdata\cfg\bans.cfg" ".\backup\serverdata\cfg" xcopy /Y /E "serverdata\oxide\data" ".\backup\serverdata\oxide\" echo Backup was successfuly made in folder /backup
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="6603" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-08-29 21:12:02" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-15 23:25:54" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_game_scripts.output_filters: File(s) copied,The system cannot find,serverdata\cfg\,File not found,The script has executed successfully

tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="6603" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-08-29 21:40:38" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-15 23:29:49" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_game_scripts.output_filters: File(s) copied,The system cannot find,serverdata\cfg\,File not found,backup\serverdata\,The script has executed successfully

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET dbname=%ThisService_UserName%_%ThisService_ServiceId% SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% SET hostinfo=%ThisService_IpHostname% mysql -h localhost -uroot -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "CREATE USER '%user%'@'%%'" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "SET PASSWORD FOR '%user%'@'%%' = PASSWORD('%password%')" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT USAGE ON * . * TO '%user%'@'%%' IDENTIFIED BY '%password%' WITH MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `%dbname%`" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON `%dbname%` . * TO '%user%'@'%%'" echo -------------------------------------------- echo Database was successfully created. echo User: %user% echo Password: %password% echo Database: %dbname% echo Host: %hostinfo%:3306
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="6603" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-02-22 22:10:37" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-15 23:29:42" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET dbname=%ThisService_UserName%_%ThisService_ServiceId% SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% SET hostinfo=%ThisService_IpHostname% mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "DROP DATABASE %dbname%" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS %dbname%" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON %dbname% . * TO '%user%'@'%%'" echo ------------------------------------------------------------- Echo Ваша база данных удалена и создана новая: Echo Пользователь: %user% Echo Пароль: %password% Echo Имя Базы: %dbname% Echo Хост: %hostinfo%:3306
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="6603" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2015-02-22 22:11:40" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-15 23:28:38" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_game_scripts.custom_prompt: This script will remove your Database and create a new. Are you agree?

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "SET PASSWORD FOR '%user%'@'%%' = PASSWORD('%password%')" echo ------------------------------------------------ echo Your password was restored! Echo Password: %password%
